name: Spicy Arrabiata Penne
instructions:
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add kosher salt to the boiling water, then add the pasta. Cook according to the package instructions, about 9 minutes.
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil and heat until the oil starts to shimmer. Add the garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the chopped tomatoes, red chile flakes, Italian seasoning and salt and pepper to taste. Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the chopped basil.
Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce. Garnish with Parmigiano-Reggiano flakes and more basil and serve warm.

name: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Linguine
instructions: Boil linguine according to package instructions. In a skillet, sauté minced garlic in butter until fragrant. Add heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper. Toss linguine in the creamy sauce. Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

name: Mango Tango Chicken Skewers
instructions: Marinate chicken chunks in mango puree, lime juice, and a blend of spices. Skewer and grill until cooked. Serve with a side of mango salsa and cilantro-lime rice.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
instructions: Butterfly chicken breasts and stuff with a mixture of spinach, feta, and garlic. Bake until chicken is cooked through. Serve with roasted vegetables.

name: Honey Sriracha Glazed Salmon
instructions: Mix honey, Sriracha, soy sauce, and minced ginger. Brush over salmon fillets and bake until glazed and flaky. Serve with steamed jasmine rice.

name: Caprese Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Toss with cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a balsamic vinaigrette. Chill before serving.

name: Lemon Herb Grilled Shrimp
instructions: Marinate shrimp in a mixture of lemon juice, garlic, and herbs. Grill until pink and opaque. Serve with a squeeze of fresh lemon.

name: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chickpeas, diced tomatoes, curry spices, and coconut milk. Simmer until flavors meld. Serve over basmati rice.

name: Pesto Zucchini Noodles
instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles. Sauté in olive oil until tender. Toss with homemade pesto, cherry tomatoes, and pine nuts.

name: Teriyaki Beef Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry thinly sliced beef with colorful bell peppers and broccoli. Add a homemade teriyaki sauce and serve over rice.

name: Cajun Blackened Tilapia
instructions: Rub tilapia fillets with Cajun seasoning. Pan-sear until blackened and cooked through. Serve with a squeeze of fresh lime.

name: Greek Salad with Orzo
instructions: Cook orzo and let it cool. Mix with cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, feta, and a Greek dressing. Chill before serving.

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Enchiladas
instructions: Roast sweet potatoes, mix with black beans, and stuff into tortillas. Top with enchilada sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

name: Raspberry Balsamic Glazed Chicken
instructions: Glaze chicken breasts with a mixture of raspberry preserves and balsamic vinegar. Grill until cooked through. Serve with a side of roasted vegetables.

name: Mushroom Risotto with Truffle Oil
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onions. Add Arborio rice and cook with vegetable broth until creamy. Drizzle with truffle oil before serving.

name: Sesame Ginger Tofu Stir-Fry
instructions: Cube tofu and stir-fry with broccoli, bell peppers, and snap peas. Toss in a sesame ginger sauce and serve over rice.

name: Lemon Rosemary Roasted Chicken
instructions: Rub chicken with lemon, rosemary, and garlic. Roast until golden brown and juices run clear. Serve with roasted potatoes.

name: Pineapple Coconut Shrimp Skewers
instructions: Marinate shrimp in a blend of pineapple juice, coconut milk, and curry powder. Skewer and grill until lightly charred.

name: Butternut Squash and Sage Risotto
instructions: Roast butternut squash and add to Arborio rice with sage. Cook with vegetable broth until creamy. Top with Parmesan cheese.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
instructions: Combine chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta. Toss with a lemon-oregano vinaigrette. Chill before serving.

name: Hawaiian BBQ Chicken Pizza
instructions: Spread BBQ sauce on pizza dough. Top with shredded chicken, pineapple, red onions, and mozzarella. Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
